name: Super Treasure Hunt (Orand)
description:
You are a pirate who can destroy obstacles with magic! But beware: each time you use your ability, a random element of the map gets destroyed as well! To make matters worse, the volcano is going to erupt soon! And it seems that the magic makes the vulcano unstable! Can you get the treasure in time?

Game was created for the Gameplicit Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/gameplicit-game-jam)

Theme: Inconvenient Superpower

  • Compelted extra challenges:
  • A sleeping Pokémon blocks the way
  • Flawless victory
  • Heroes never die
  • Press F to pay respects
  • RTX On
  • There are no Easter Eggs up here
  • Too much water
  • You’re almost a Jill sandwich! (?)
